Articles.Content:
Hi,

So I've been playing KSP for a while with lots of visual mods. The game looks way cooler with EVE and scatterer, but I notice the colors are a little bit pale and cool (I mean, blue-ish). Is there any ways of making the colors more vibrant and hot?

I'm not really sure where I should put this topic, so move it as you want.

Edited May 31, 2016 by awfulhumanbeing

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

If you have a specific question about a specific mod, the best place to ask is probably in that mod's thread.

Just now, Snark said:

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

If you have a specific question about a specific mod, the best place to ask is probably in that mod's thread.

Glad i dont flood the other forums.

No, i am searching for mods, thats why i posted this topic in the main forum.

1 hour ago, awfulhumanbeing said:

No, i am searching for mods, thats why i posted this topic in the main forum.

Ah, okay.  It sounded like you were saying "Due to some combination of Scatterer and/or EVE, the colors are not really what I prefer.  Is there some setting in Scatterer and/or EVE to tweak this?"  And if that were the case, the Scatterer and/or EVE threads would be the place to ask.

If you're actually just looking for a general-purpose mod for adjusting the overall color scheme of the game, then yeah, that's a more general question.  Though still really best suited for the Add-on Discussions forum rather than General KSP Discussion.

Agreed, @Snark, my bad.

About the mod - it turned out there is sort of a seperate program for this - GEMFX. Seems to work!
